Class ParticlePool

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParticlePool
  • public class ParticlePool
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton that optimizes particle effects with object pooling.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ParticlePool​(int particleCount)
      Constructs a particle pool with the specified number of particles.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static PoolingQueue<Particle> getParticles()
      Gets the queue of particles this spawns from.
      static void spawn​(GeoVector pos, GeoVector vel, double size, java.awt.Color color)
      Spawns a particle with an initial velocity, position, size and color.

    • Method Detail

      • getParticles

        public static PoolingQueue<Particle> getParticles()
        Gets the queue of particles this spawns from.
        Returns:
        A queue that contains all of this particle pool's particles.

      • spawn

        public static void spawn​(GeoVector pos,

                         double size,
                         java.awt.Color color)
        Spawns a particle with an initial velocity, position, size and color.
        Parameters:

        vel - The initial velocity.
        size - The initial size.
        color - The particle's color.
